monster.name: Frog

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

monster.description: A frog has no effective attacks. It feeds on small insects and typically dwells near water, in trees, or underground. The frog's statistics can also be used to represent a toad.Source: Monster Manual p. 322, Tomb of Annihilation
